review text: Nice coffee maker for limited space but must fill with water every time you make coffee and slow to make coffee but is hot. Next time I would another coffee maker
It makes great coffee with either pods or reg. coffee grounds. Simple use and takes up only a small amount of space.
Fits perfectly in my apartment kitchen and works a lot faster then expected.

It’s really easy to make coffee with it right now.
And the cup is really cute.

review name: It's a bit cheap and messy, and you won't be proud of it, but it'll get the job done.
review text:
Can't believe I gotta defend the KINGTOO Thermal Drip Instant Coffee Machine with Self Cleaning Function. I'm not even a big fan of the thing. We got it at work to replace our old knockoff Keurig because it started dripping nonstop after it already finished brewing. It does it too, just not as badly. You can see the remnants of it's coffee splatters in my photo. It's a daily chore to wipe everything down after every use. It drips so bad you would think it has an enlarged prostate. It dribbles like the 2004 Suns featuring a young Steve Nash. It splatters like an ice cream cake falling out of your clumsy uncle's touchy hands during your horrible childhood birthday party.

With that said, it works as a coffee maker. You clean it every month or so with vinegar or a cleaning k-cup. It is what it is. So I can't believe I have to defend this barely passable thing from the couple people complaining about not being able to choose your cup size. You add the water and it brews what you add. You want less, add less, add more, and you get more. The things borderline crap but you can't fault it for your own incompetence. What's next? People are gonna say, "My new Camry is crap! I crashed when I tried steering with my feet. One star! Curse you Toyota!"
The KINGTOO Thermal Drip Instant Coffee Machine with Self Cleaning Function isn't great, its only barely almost good, but it's not feet driving bad either.

review name: easy to use kcup & 14 oz pot maker
review text:
this was easy to use right out of box, washed 1st of course! instructions are included, useful for the self cleaning option which is easy to forget as it's not a simple push button but a combination of buttons.

so far I've used 12 kcups & several 14 oz pots of automatic drip coffee, does equally well on both, very reliable si far!

the maximum amount it holds is 14 oz, but loses close to an ounce in evaporation. you add the amount you want to adjust for stronger or weaker brew with more, or less, water.

this news either choice very quickly, under 2 minutes max so far. I can fill it, brew it while reading my cat & it's then ready to go.

the only thing that would make this better is a timer for having your cup ready when you wake up. otherwise this buy is well worth the money.
Excellent size and function, exactly what was promised. I get perfect coffee, bean or kureg

review name: Coffee comes out very hot and flavorful - super simple to operate - automatic
review text: I've had several Keurig brand makers and they've all sucked. This simple inexpensive coffee maker not only looks good it makes great coffee and really hot (Keurig machines never makes it as hot - yuk). Is super simple just put water (whatever level of water you put that is how much it will come out so measure carefully). Press a button and is done. No need to do anything else. Love it.
Too light wieght for the price. Be careful lifting the lid you might pull up the entire unit. It needs a weighted bottom.

Very excited to receive my Kingtoo coffee maker. I didn't know a dessert spoon (uk) vs. a teaspoon (usa). Also I used 8 oz of water, which was too much. Once I used 2.5 teaspoons of coffee grinds to 6 oz of water.
I enjoyed a robust cup of coffee. The milk frothier only needs a very small amount of whole milk.
I'm a medical professional for over 20 years. A great cup of coffee is worth a few minutes; besides by the time you check your iphone its ready! Looks very nice on the kitchen counter.
Great little machine for a one cup morning. I use my own grounds and its perfect every time. Couple of very minor kinks but worked them out. Highly recommend.

I had one just like it made by another company that finally bit the dust. Got this one and it is exactly like my old one! I am not disappointed though because I like that you can use pods or grounds and the coffee turns out well.

review name: Great buy for one cup coffee maker, k cup or regular coffee nice option
review text: Very excited about getting this one cup coffee maker. 14oz cup comes with it. It allows you to use K cups or has a separate filter for regular coffee grounds. The option for regular grounds is awesome and cheaper. The filter keeps grounds from coming out. Only issue is if you’re making several cups at a time it’s rather hot to remove fast. The unit is well made and heats water fast. I recommend purified water so that you have less of a problem of calcium buildup that I have had in past coffee makers. Price was very reasonable.

I love the color and the fact that it is single serve but it is definitely not the most functional coffee pot. You have to add water for every use which isn't a big deal but it's inconvenient but it also takes about 5 minutes just to heat up and start making one cup and it pours until either the water runs out or you turn it off yourself. It doesn't have an automatic stop pour so you basically have to stand right next to it the whole time and also the plastic on the machine itself gets very hot and you can even smell a burning plastic smell when it's going. It's is still usable but probably would not buy again.

Apparently, I kept hearing the loud noise lately rather than my coffee (i.e. Hazelnut) pouring quickly like a typical Keurig coffeemaker would despite my efforts to clean my above coffeemaker's parts in my dishwasher last night.
So going forward, I sure hope my above review can be very helpful for improving our future coffeemakers (i.e. EZ-to-use touchscreen TECH & lighter water reservoir, respectively) since I've been enjoying my own coffee dating back to late AUG '13.
Ditto for any of those cool YouTube-style how-to videos for 1st-time coffeemakers still learning how to make their own coffee & saving themselves an extra coffee shop expenditure.
Beth Budner, Auburndale, MA!
Great coffee maker! My college student & my adult sister love this & their travel mugs! Highly recommended.

Un poco desilusionada. Pensé que era para diferentes medidas y no es así.
Pero aún así mezcla muy bien. Sabor. intenso como me gusta.

review name: Easy to use and no leaks.
review text: I bought this because I’ve seen there’s a travel mug included in the package, and it is so small in size. This is perfect for me and my PC Desk since I work from home now. I can make coffee right at my desk. I have a lot of K-Cups so I won’t be using coffee ground but that was interesting that it has 2 modes (K-Cup and Coffee Ground). It seems to be easy to use because there’s only 2 buttons for operation. For me, a good coffee maker has to be easy to use, no leaks, and easy to clean. This coffee maker met all of those conditions. I like it!
Happy with this product

review name: Not the best k cup coffee maker
review text:
I bought this for my husband and he does not like it. It's takes too long to make a normal size cup of coffee. Like 2 k cups. The blending frother thing is pretty cool though.
My flavor rating is just there...I do not think the machine effects flavor. I am just going to keep it because of the hassle of the return and liking the frother...but as a k cup coffee maker. It's a no go for us!

Seems to be working well so far. The reservoir is very small so is easiest if you use a spouted cup to add water. When brewing coffee grounds in the basket provided, afterwards it is necessary to flush out with another cup of water run in cycle since can't get in there to clean it any other way. I've only had this machine a couple of weeks so will really know how good it performs over next few months. If it doesn't have any issues then I will add 5th star & consider buying another in the future.

I bought this coffee maker because most of the reviews were good and I liked the idea of a milk frother,which works like it's supposed to, other than that, I'm kind of disappointed. I don't know about any of y'all, but I want my coffee to be done quickly, I don't want to have to wait for it, this pot is a little on the slow side. Also, the hot plate isn't adjustable, so if you use a smaller cup, the coffee will drip outside the cup. Another thing I don't care for, is you can't adjust the size of your cup. I like to set up my pot of coffee, then be able to decide if I want a bigger or smaller cup later, you can't do that with this. The coffee flavor is fine, not great, but fine. Honestly, if I had known about these details, I wouldn't have bought it

This thing brews just fine but tastes like plastic. I’ve now brewed vinegar and rubbing alcohol though it to try and get the plastic taste out and it’s only worked somewhat. Probably 20 cycles with vinegar and still somewhat of an off flavor.

I like the look of this single serve coffee maker. I like that it came with a travel mug. But, The functions don't work for me. The button to open the coffee chamber (pods or grounds) pushes the whole machine so I need two hands as this machine is very light weight. Also, I like that I have 4 different sizes to chose from for cups. But it's almost impossible to tell which water level you need to be at to get the coffee size you want unless you have a lot of light in the area. I want to select my coffee size from the outside of the machine instead of the inside water chamber.

This machine works, but I'm not sure I'll keep it. For the price, I think I can get one that has the functions I need.

Small in size. Does not take up a lot of space. Arrived early on shipping. Packaged well. Makes a good cup of coffee. Travel mug works really well. Spill proof top. Keep drink hot. Easy clean up. Would buy again.

review name: Awesome value. Most used appliance in my kitchen
review text:
My family loves this little hot water maker. The adults use it for coffee and tea and the kids use it for hot chocolate and warm apple cider. It takes all the K-Cups we've put in it and as the other reviews say sometimes not all of the water that you put in the machine ends up coming out but I don't find that to be troublesome as the difference is generally negligible.

The cup that comes with this coffee maker is the best I've ever had at keeping my coffee warm for hours. I'll be buying a second machine for the office, but mostly to have another one of those cups. 🤣

review name: Nifty little single kcup/grounds attractive red coffee maker that's easy to use
review text: I only gave it 4 stars given the pour slot is fairly small and it's a bit hard not to spill water when trying to pour into the water tub. Other than that it brews a delicious cup of coffee very well, whether you use a kcup or coffee grounds. The attachments are easy to clean as well.

I like the color, and size ... quality is okay, mostly plastic (I wasn't expecting plastic), comparing to similar units of others brands it seems overpriced, that is why I give 3stars.
I like that I can use both ground coffee and k pods. Meets my needs.

Yes, it makes coffee.

But it slops water on the counter and that last sip at the bottom of the mug has enough grounds in it to be downright chewy.

I sent it back and have gone back to the simple, no fail pour over. Cheap, easy to use and plenty to choose from that don’t require a paper filter.

review name: I really wish this worked the way it's supposed to!
review text: I bought this coffee maker and milk frother for work, so I wouldn't stop every day and buy one. The K cups aren't punctured properly on the bottom when you insert them to make a cup. You have to manually puncture the bottom so that the coffee can flow through it. Then, usually, the coffee won't flow on the first try, so you have to take out the K cup, reinsert it, and try again. The milk frother works ok, although I don't think it spins fast enough. I wish that I would have kept the box, I would return it and buy one made elsewhere.
It’s good for single use. Have to wait for water to heat up and every use. Works great but it’s not for me.
You can use regular ground coffee or k cups which is a feature I really like.
Wasn't sure if I was going like it or not.. However, We all LOVE IT!!!
It's compact but dies the full job. The frother is even super easy to use...I'm getting them for my adult kids, they'll love it!

This is a quality product and makes excellent coffee. My girlfriend likes her coffee weak, so she pours in more water, and I like it strong, so I use less water. We have had it about 2 months without any issues. We have only used k cups so far, but it does come with a screened basket. I researched several similar items, and chose this one based on the price, and other positive reviews. I think it is a good value for the money. (Blending power does not apply, but I did not want to give it a bad review.). Steam pressure is excellent!!
I got it based on reviews for a good cup of coffee while the Krups at this price did not, and I'm not disappointed! A wonderful full flavored cup of coffee! And I'm picky!

review name: Great product just what I expectes

review text: Was really nice to be able to pick a color that matched my kitchen other than black!

I have liked this coffee machine so far. It takes a while for it to heat up but it works for me. It is heating up the water you've just dumped into it. The size is small so it doesn't take much room on the counter.
Looks like an excellent coffee maker for my son-in-law for Christmas! He's a Green Bay Packers fan so color was fabulous!

The coffee machine works with no issues. I really like the act that has the two options for k-cup and ground coffee. I have used both so far but mostly the ground coffee set up. The water heats up fast enough for me while I am doing breakfast and I like the fact that there is a lid on top of the coffee grounds that cause a drip. Coffee comes out nicely hot and the taste is nice and clear. The travel mug is a great addition and makes the whole process easier because I right away take it with me to go to work. Overall very satisfied.

Got this for my dad for Christmas. He absolutely loves it. One thing I was surprised that he really enjoyed is that you pour in only as much water as you want for coffee. He uses the frother every day and makes my Mom coffee (even though she doesn't like coffee) just to use the frother more. I was surprised to see that the frother heats up your milk!
It's a little slower than the popular pod maker, but it makes hotter coffee. And the milk frother is a game changer.

It a wonderful single cup coffee maker. I've been enjoying it. I love the color. It's just weird there are 2 buttons for heating water. The best way to measure water is to use the coffee cup you'll be using to drink the coffee out of. I would buy it again.

Got this for my home office to brew on my desk and it's perfect. Brews up fast, cleans up easy. To pour in the small space in the back I usually put the lid on the included tumbler and pour out the drink spout, add my grounds in the reusable filter, and press and go. 3 minutes later I'm adding cream and sipping on rich, caffeinated sanity.
I have used it every day since I got it about 6 months ago and it works perfectly

review name: VERY SLOW! Not worth the money!
review text: I bought this because I wanted something simple, but effective. This coffee maker takes forever to make a single cup! I'm telling you....it takes almost as much time to make one cup as it does to brew a whole pot of coffee in a traditional coffee maker. Don't waste your money.

Bought this to use at work . Used once and the lids are already warped. It's made insanely cheap and nit worth the paying price. Super disappointed in this. This is maybe worth paying $20 . I was hoping for a coffee maker that is quiet and brews a good cup. It sounds like it's about to explode just before releasing the coffee, but warps the lid more each time you brew a cup. Not worth the money

Bought this machine in March, and it has been fantastic at half the price of my former Keurig. Unfortunately, it stopped working last week, and I contacted the seller for a warranty replacement. I received a new one yesterday. Their emails to me were so nice, and the replacement came so fast!! This is a great machine, provided by a wonderful seller!

I used to have a 4 cup coffee maker but I only drink one mug in the morning. I was throwing coffee away every day. So I took advantage of Amazon day and bought this. I used ground coffee at first. If you cut down a #2 cone filter to put in the loose coffee pod, disposal is easier. Now I bought pod coffees. So easy. Sometimes I even drink two mugs.

review name: just did not care for it
review text: I bought this Coffee Machine after sadly breaking my last amazing expresso machine. I figured this time around I would go small (since I got used to the extra space on the counter) and this model caught my eye. I purchased it, tried it, and sadly it just did not work out the way I wanted it to, something about it was just off. I am sure others would like it just fine. I am just picky when it comes to my coffee and how it is brewed

review name: Coffee maker was a great gift!!!
review text: I bought this for as a Christmas present for my parents who are homebound during Covid. I also bought hot chocolate, apple cider, tea, and various coffee‘s for them to drink using this. They absolutely love it they are having so much fun trying new drinks in it. My parents said that it comes out super hot and they fight over the cup that comes with it because they love it! I’m so happy that this entertains my parents and they love it so much!!!
Very space saving, blends great, beautiful!

After buying a Sboly 3-in-1, Single Serving Coffeemaker that worked really well for only about two weeks —and just stopped working!— this Kingtoo Brand looks like a nicer fraternal twin to the Sloby Coffeemaker, but so far so good!—Every attempted cup has been a very nice success! If it should follow the disappointing short-life of its twin—I’ll update this review. But—🤞🏻Fingers Crossed🤞🏻—hopefully that won’t be necessary! Time will tell!

review name: Coffee maker broke within a few months
review text: Worked great till it didn't coffee maker broke wothin a few months it would heat up water but wouldnt brew lot of money for nothing the frother can be found cheaper elsewhere and a better maker can be used
This single serve coffee maker is super cute but very slow…. Takes a while to brew however, coffee is hot and yummy. So if you’re not in a rush and want delicious coffee, this is perfect for you!
This little machine is just the same as the Keurig it replaced. I hope it lasts longer.
n/a

It is a great coffee machine , frother machine is working perfectly fine. It brews the coffee decently and maintaining coffee’s strength is easy. It can brew in two ways that is a good feature I felt. I personally felt froth machine should have more capacity to make froth. I use it often it just works fine. Cleaning of coffee maker is easy. Over all is a decent product.

Great for small counter space. Uses K cups or drip. also loose tea and just hot water. We love it.
Thanks, Dan
Don't buy it. Spend the extra money and buy something better. Don't make my mistake

Love my little coffee maker. Fix just fine on my small counter and make good coffee and easy to use. If u have a small counter these is a good coffee make to have. I had my for four months and use it daily

review name: Pot is good but I bought more expensive one for the travel mug
review text: I didn't get the travel mug that I paid extra for

It's very easy to use. Easy to clean. Makes coffee quickly. The option to use a k-cup or a basket included for ground coffee. LOVE the red color. It's the most civilized way to make coffee first thing in the morning!

review name: Love the K cup or ground coffee options.
review text: This works as well as more expensive brand and I love the two coffee baskets that come with it. Very eco friendly. Easy to wipe up and keep clean. Makes great coffee.
Use every day. Works as it should.

I bought the version with the frother (haven't used it yet though) and it's working great so far. I used the K-cups and it brews a perfect cup every time. Looking forward to using it with grounds. If you're looking for a basic maker without a million bells and whistles, this is perfect. Very happy with my purchase.

review name: Leaves lots of grounds in bottom of cup, using kcups
review text: Heavy grounds in bottom of cup

I would
Prefer a reserve but it is simple and easy to use.
I’ve had it for a few months now and still works no complaints
This coffee maker is great , I love that I can just make a cup of coffee and don't have to make s whole pot,so far I have the pot for a couple months and I have no problem
Like my coffee Hot Hot and it gets it there and beyond. Fits under my cabinet just fine and it is red like the rest of my small appliances. In other words love it
Would recommend! I like the ability to NOT use a kcup. It comes with cup for ground coffee.
I'm quite happy with my new coffee maker. It is quick, makes great coffee time after time at just the right temperature. SO HAPPY!
Wrong color which i am fine with but im missing the cup

review name: Not pleased with this unit at all
review text: I purchased this coffee maker mainly to use it for single-cup purposes. I tried it for the first time today, unfortunately out of the return window timeframe. Ugh. With the correct amount of water in the unit, the coffee maker did not dispense all the water. I maybe got 6 oz in my cup. The unit continued s l o w l y dripping for several minutes (directions say to wait until dripping stops but, seriously, if waiting that long is what needs to happen, the coffee will be COLD). Upon further checking, water remained in the unit that was supposed to be in my cup. VERY DISAPPOINTED and wish I could return. :(
As a Christmas gift for my in laws, they love it, very convenient to use when they are camping.
Works really well. Not the fastest but good things are worth the wait, especially if it's only 3 minutes. I use ground coffee not K-cups.
I love this coffee maker, I didn't want a large coffee maker on my counter taking up so much space. This is perfect and so easy to use ..I make 2 cups at a time...great!
The milk forther does not work and this I s basically the reason I purchased. The wisk inside the further does not spin despite me changing it to the replacement. So disappointed 😞
The frother is great just don't have the outside get water on it. The switch is very sensitive and any drop of water will stop it from working. Worked once I dried it off and put back together.

review name: I got this to give someone as a gift
review text: I purchased this for Christmas gift for someone. They tell me that they love it!
Frother works better than my old one. Will take getting used to. But over all very happy.
Easy to use and it comes with 2 ground coffee filters and a k cup holder nice and good color and sterdyness and cheeper
This is a quick easy and excellent way to have a cup of coffee any time you want one. Was a wonderful gift for my daughter
I love everything about it. Fast and GREAT coffee and frother is a fabulous !

review name: Good frother, jury still out for drip coffee
review text:
The frother worked with most dairy alternatives--soy was best.

I have not yet figured out how to brew a decent cup using grounds with this machine.
Works perfectly
It works really well, no issues here.
Creates really hot coffee. Love that I can use my favorite coffe and not add to the landfill with pods. Very happy so far
I love this product the Brew it’s a little bit Hot for a metal travel cup. I also love the father it’s powerful and the fact that it makes cold and hot froth is amazing
I have one for home and office.

Can’t recommend this product. I ordered a red one; they sent a black one. It’s made cheaply, of thin plastic. Sure, it heats water up and drips it through coffee grounds, and the tumbler that comes with it is a nice touch. But having previously had a Keurig that is sturdy and solid, I wish I’d spent a little more and gone with another Keurig.
Very easy to use, not like some blenders that you have to solve a puzzle just to make a cup.
Ok was ok. I returned it.
i like it it is a good product
Beautiful and sleek machine. The coffee tasted great and fresh. Easy to clean and assemble. 100% Recommended.
The price was fantastic. It was a Christmas gift for my best friend! She uses it everyday! Absolutely loves it!! It’s very quick & the flavor comes out amazing.
I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves it and had nothing negative to say about it. She loves the milk frother as well!
Small full service one cup coffee maker perfect for RV, the thermal cup is outstanding, wish I could get a second cup like it
I love this compact coffee maker. Easy to use, and it’s fast! The included mug is great! Stays warm inside but cool to the touch outside, and easy to clean.

review name: Easy to use and space saver
review text: The blending power in this coffee maker is great and the milk frother is EASY TO USE. I am overall very satisfied with this product. I highly recommend it.

review name: Easy to use and makes great, hot coffee.
review text: This coffee maker is lightweight, and very easy to use. And if you are tired of medium temperature coffee makers, this one is for you. It heats the water incredibly.
I bought one and only could use the blender for 3 months. It stopped working after that. Really frustrated about this product.
Nice little machine and great color.
No problem with this machine
Nice color
Item worked good at first. But 3 weeks in, and it lost all power to push water through a K-cup (I only drink 1 cup of coffee a day). It Still works using ground coffee, and the straining basket.

review name: Too many loose parts to put to assemble every time.
review text: The product's best feature is that it comes with a milk frother, but the coffee maker's assembly is confusing because it has too many loose parts. The opening to place the coffee strainer or K-Cup is small, and the design and location of the water reservoir are challenging to maneuver.

review name: Basic. Works very well and like coffee paperless filter.
review text: Liked everything about it.
It works well, nice for small space. Love the red.
Excelente muy bueno lo recomiendo al 100%
This has been a great little coffee maker to use at work. I love it.

Wonderful product !!
Surprising how great the frothier works !!
Great t fit in small spaces !
me gusto todo a muy buen precio buena calida la cafetera y la maquinita para la leche
Easy to use the equipment
Had to return it because it leaked coffee grinds all into the cup
Easy to use

When I purchased this pot the only issue I had was that it takes longer than the Keurig to heat up. Today it just stops dripping water into the cup. Now I am out of money with a useless pot. I don't recommend purchasing this pot. Spend the little extra money and get the Keurig.

It doesn’t deserve any stars . I followed the instructions and cleaned it the way they said before the first use. Since then I’ve tried to use it with the Kcup and it does not heat the water. Cold water in, cold water out. So disappointing -I’m returning it.

review text:

Didn’t work well for us- max is a small cup of coffee didn’t fill up a mug- extra coffee drips out, makes a mess by splashing and a bunch of pieces to clean when you’re done. Will be returning

review name: Cute and perfect for small space. And brewing makes its easy.

review text: Great
It has been working amazing. I still haven't use the milk attachment yet.
It works!!
bought for a client and is very easy to use

This made about 10 cups of delicious latte until the frother stopped working. I didn’t submerse it in water.

I am hoping that it will suddenly start working properly again.
Stopped working dispensing water.

I’ve used coffee maker 5 days every week for the Past 2 months and now it won’t make coffee. I cleaned out the water reservoir and K cup filter and still no luck. Pretty upset that I dropped $40 on a single serve coffee maker that didn’t even last 2 months. P

Blending power, warmth, easy to use.

Doesn't shut off however much water is in it that's what's coming out so over flows your cup .

The coffee make works great. The brother died after less than two weeks. Consider that before purchase,
This thing is junk ! Super hard to clean takes forever to brew a cup of coffee. It’s hard to fill with water without a mess. Junk ! Don’t buy !

review name: Like Most Coffee Makers, Coffee is Just Average
review text:
When you buy a coffee machine like this one, the quality of coffee you get is just average. This is not the fault of this machine, just to be clear. It’s just that you won’t get high-quality coffee with these types of machines. I get a way better cup of coffee using my stovetop Moka Pot than I can get with these types of machines. However, for ease of use and convenience, this machine works well.

I love that you can use both ground coffee and K-Cup pods with this machine. The water capacity is from 6-14oz. I was using 6oz water and the maximum amount of ground coffee (there’s a line in the container that tells you the maximum amount of ground coffee you can fill in it) to make my cup. I felt my coffee was quite weak and watery, even with using the lowest amount of water, but I don’t think it’s the fault of this machine. I think I’m used to coffee from my Moka Pot which makes thick, rich coffee.

For milk, I got the best results from frothing milk before adding to the coffee or using a creamer. Here’s a tip. If you don’t have a milk frother, you can add a bit of warm milk to a French Press and pump it up and down a few times. You’ll have frothy milk in no time.

This machine gets a good score from me for its easy cleaning process, ease of use, convenience, and quick coffee-making time. It’s lightweight and small so it doesn’t take up much space. It’s slightly on the pricier side, especially when other branded machines are similarly priced.

I cannot really fault it much but I don’t find myself reaching for this when I need a cup of coffee. This is, of course, a personal preference. My Moka Pot gets used way more than this machine.

review name: Too flimsy and top heavy for my situation, and single-serve proved to be frustrating
review text:
This might be a decent choice for someone who is very careful to not knock over things and willing to deal with a lightweight, somewhat vertical and top-heavy appliance oriented to single serving. For me, I was looking to use this Kingdoo coffee maker on a jobsite in a building where the electric install is not complete, meaning that it was on a table plugged into an adapter on the floor. In no time at all, on the first morning I set it up, its cord had been had been kicked and it was on the floor with the fragile hinge to the water compartment broken.

In fairness to the product, it is not specifically designed to be rugged, but I was concerned that even in a regular kitchen plugged into a wall outlet, it would be very easy for anyone moving quickly to knock this over while loading water or dealing with the attachments needed to insert K cups or coffee. Also, the hinge was a bit tricky to operate from the get-go.

Also if you are used to a brand-name coffee maker using capsules or pods, this coffee maker may be a bit baffling to you given its lack of width at the base, which the brand-name models have to provide stability. Also be aware that as mentioned in the. name, this is a single-serve appliance , which means it may not be the best choice for any group setting (job site, office, etc.) because you have to load it with water for each use.

Review of Coffee Maker, Single Serve Coffee Maker Compatible with K-Cup Pod & Ground Coffee, KINGDOO Thermal Drip Instant Coffee Machine with Self Cleaning Function, Brew Strength Control (Red) (Green with Travel Cup)
When the water starts heating it gets to bubbling so much that hot water and coffee is spluttering from the water reservoir and kcup area to land on the counter top.
Video Player is loading.

review name: Great machine & as good as leading brand, but IMHO a little high on price…

review text: This is a neat little machine. You can use either k cups or ground coffee. It is fast and the coffee is good and hot. The travel mug is a plus. You can select a beverage of up to fourteen ounces. I would prefer more but this little machine delivers. The travel mug is decent. It maintains beverage temperature. The self cleaning feature is just running hot water through. The compact size makes it ideal for places where space is at a premium.

This single serve K cup coffee machine is your basic single cup of coffee machine. Water fill in the rear of the machine. Makes coffee with either K cups, or a refillable coffee pod holder. Has two buttons for operation, one for k-cups, and the other, you guessed it, the refillable coffee pod. The color is a decent shade of olive. Works like a drip coffee maker, and extremely easy to use. This sells for $69.99 (as of this review), and I think maybe $10 bucks to high. But, the matching travel cup makes up a few dollars. A basic machine but works every time

Ok so I ordered this coffee maker and to my surprise I’ve been using it for a few months and I have to say I’m very happy with it. It came nicely packed and with attachments to change from brewing from ground beans to an interchangeable piece that you can pop a kcup pod. I love it definitely recommend this

I ordered this for my husband. They have the ability to make a pot of coffee but with light of what's going on prefers to make individual cups. This worked out well for him. He filled it easily and was able to brew a cup of coffee in less than 5 minutes. It may not have all the bells and whistle as a larger one or the more popular one but it does a good job.
I liked the retro green color. It adds a splash of color in his neutral office.

I got this for my husband as he loves his coffee in the mornings.
Compared to the previous single serve coffee machine that we had, this Kingtoo coffee maker is a great upgrade.
The coffee machine looks of good quality with thick plastic material.
It comes with 2 filter cups for ground coffee and k-cups which is a nice feature.
Also, the bottom tray is removable and easy to clean. By removing the bottom net, I can fit my coffee mug easily.
I felt the price is a little high compared to other $60 dollar coffee makers.

review name: Cute, compact but a lil splashy
review text:
Great options for self or item add coffee pods or simply fill the reusable filter.

No measuring cup included, but you can adjust the size of your pour, which is great.

Brews within 2 minutes. I prep mine at night and then just hit the button first thing in the morning for fresh and delicious coffee.

You will have some splashing because the mug seat isn’t adjustable. This doesn’t bother me in the slightest, because I clean the coffee maker daily.

Avocado green is a nice throwback to those late 60’s/70’s kitchens.

The unit works fine and I like the self cleaning option. The cup is a nice bonus, but not necessary, and I'd rather forego the cup for a lower price. 50.00 seems like an ok price and shouldn't be higher for a different color, but that is how things are these days. Tall enough to fit tall tumblers with a fairly small counter footprint.

This is a very simple-to-use K-cup type coffee maker. I fill it with water, install a K-cup coffee pod, pour water into the container, and press a single button. Within less than a minute, coffee begins streaming out and I soon have my morning cup ready to go. It comes with a permanent filter for use with freshly ground beans or ground coffee so I don't have to buy the expensive K-cup pods all the time. It's a very basic machine--the only choice I have to make (other than type of coffee I want) is whether I'm using a K-cup or brewing with the permanent filter pod. The color is a nice soft green that actually goes with our kitchen so that's a nice bonus.

The machine is small and takes up very little counter space. It's also lightweight so if I want to store it away on an upper shelf it's no problem to lift it up or get it down for use. Overall, it's a decent machine that works well and doesn't take up a lot of space. There aren't a lot of fancy attachments or functions that I don't need. It just brews a single cup of coffee when I want it. There is beauty in simplicity.

This coffee machine definitely makes my mornings go smoother. The machine is extremely easy to use, and it takes less than three minutes to brew a cup of hot coffee. I like how you can use k-cups or ground coffee with this, and they provide two filters for ground coffee so you have an extra if one's dirty. It's easy to fill the machine with water, there are notches at 8oz, 10 oz, etc. so you can custom brew it to how strong you want it. There's a drip tray at the bottom to catch any spilled coffee, and it's overall very easy to clean. I love the green color, looks very nice on my counter. This machine was just what I needed as a busy college student always in need of a caffeine fix!
Had only a few months and the coffee is cold.

We received this machine as a Christmas present and it does a great job. I am so looking forward to camping season so we can use this in a campground. In the meantime, it will do when all I want is a single cup rather than firing up the big coffee maker. It's fast and easy to clean.

For sixty bucks, you could buy a legit mini-Keurig or a Keurig with a multi-cup reservoir tank. So why go for this Kingtoo model? I'd expect an off brand like this to go for maybe half the price.

It works OK, brews a cup in about 4 minutes. It's nice that they give 2 filter cups for ground coffee, so you can wash one and still have another to use. Simple to fill and start, and has a self-cleaning option (although honestly can't you just run a non-coffee cycle to clean any maker?). 14oz capacity is still short of the typical 20oz go-cup size I prefer.

review name: Don't waste your time or money.
review text: Bought one recently and it made a grand total of four cups of coffee before it broke. It continued to heat up but refused to dispense coffee. I was completely ready to return it when I opened it, this thing is made of super thin, super crappy plastic. And don't get excited for the "nice mug" so many reviews say it comes with, it no longer does. Save up and buy a nicer one, that's what I'm doing.

review name: Works great. As pictured. Nice HOT coffee too!
review text:
Honest review here.

Was very pleased with this single serve coffee maker and it works great... not to mention makes HOT coffee!

PROS:
Slim design
Single serve coffee maker
Nice self cleaning function...just press both brew bottons to get it to clean
Can use coffee grounds or pods ... Both work great
Choose the amount of water and press brew button
Includes a travel mug

I can recommend! Good value too!

review name: Works great and is easy to use.
review text: Super easy to use and is fast at making a cup of coffee. You can put either loose coffee grounds or pods in this. This even came with a matching travel mug so you can just grab and go. That’s awesome. I would highly recommend this coffee machine.
It’s a fake, but a well made one. I don’t drink coffee but have to depend on the word of others. So far, I have had no complaints.

Mines doesn’t have a blender but what I love about this machine is that it works for kcups or ground coffee I’m so happy because when it came I hadn’t gotten any kcups yet and I really wanted to use it then as I was reading the book it has a brew for k cups or regular ground coffee that’s great it come with a nice leak resistant travel mug which I use daily now I can make just enough coffee without wasting it making a pot I won’t drink the price is wonderful and it’s the perfect gift idea

I always make a large cup of coffee in the morning for my hour-long commute to work. The slim Keurig pod machine that I'd been using was really intended for a regular size cup, not a travel mug. This coffee maker allows me to quickly brew coffee that completely fills my large on-the-go mug. I also like that it gives me the option to use ground coffee as well as the pods if I so choose. It takes up little space on the counter, and I like the light avocado green color. Overall it is a winner.

review name: Faulty pot, and replacement failed on second try as well.
review text:
Update: Kingtoo finally responded and sent a new coffee pot. It also failed on ground function, but worked once on the pod setting. And now won't work again on either setting. That's two bad pots in a row... Definitely not just a one-off.

-----
I have had a pod machine from another brand just like this for over 5 years, so I was excited to get this pretty green version to replace my old one. However, it has failed so miserably I have had to go back to my old machine.

First, the safety switch that the lid should hold down to let the machine work, fails. It is like the lid pops up slightly as it heats up. Then, if you risk burning yourself by holding down the lid, something in the thermal sensor also fails, so it boils very hard for several minutes... Shooting and dribbling out the back until finally it sputters less than half the water through to your cup.

To make matters worse, I tried to contact the company by the card it included in its box with no response. Then I tried contacting through Amazon, and they still haven't responded over a week later.

I like this style of machine, bit this fails so hard, and the complete lack of response means I wish I could give it zero stars.
Video Player is loading.

unfortunately, the one i ordered was stolen out of my parcel box, but.. i ordered another one, the exact same one, and it works fantastic. the coffee is a little stronger than i am used to, but everyone tells me i drink 'stump water' instead of coffee.. but i really like this. it is super convenient, and simple to use.

The water tank has marks showing the water volume. Very convenient. The size is not so big. It doesn't occupy so much space on the countertop. Especially in our home, only I drinks coffee but my husband doesn't, therefore I don't hope to use a super big family-size coffee maker.

review name: Single Serve Coffee Maker with Travel Mug
review text: These is a great affordable coffee machine. It's easy to setup and use. You can use prefilled k-cups or make your own. This works just as good as your more expensive machine at a cheaper price. Love that it comes with a travel mug too. Great buy and would recommend.

review name: Narrow takes up very little space
review text:
Love the retro 70s color. It's narrow and fits on a crowded counter top. Works great with k cups brewed to a cup or the included travel mug to go or around the house without spilling.

Definitely happy with it.

This unit is truly amazing and I love it. Brews great coffee at a perfect temperature for me. But the frother is exceptional especially when you finally know how to create the froth. I read every review to try and get some direction and one person said to use Soy milk which was perfect. Almond milk will not froth. And now My lattes look better than the coffee shops. This morning I added just a tiny bit of chocolate peppermint creamer to the soy milk and it was a perfect Christmas morning latte. I Love this unit and highly recommend it.

Great single serve coffee maker! This cute machine is slim in design but powerful.
My guests have been very happy with this machine & it’s speed.
Thrilled to have found it!

Really want to make coffee at home! Deliberately，decided on this one! To my surprise it’s works perfectly. Love this green color! The coffee I made is nice! Really recommended this coffee maker! You just need little space to place! And brews quickly!

Our daughter surprised us with this wonderful "1 cup coffee/drink maker!!! KINGTOO" Coffee Machine! for Christmas!! Love it so much! When it is ready-the water is so warm- plus stays warm in the cup it came with, for hours!! I've been using it every day--sometimes just using the Hot water for my instant coffee! Love choosing which K-cups to use also!
I have had other popular styles which never made the water Hot enough! I definitely recommend this make!

Includes a large travel mug and very easy to set up. You can use the reusable K-Cup or regular K-Cups in the machine. Easy to fill and empty. Easy to wipe down and clean drip tray. Great value for the set compared to a namebrand machine.
Love this space saver coffee maker, very happy with it so far,
It’s easy to use and makes very tasty coffee. Cleaning is pretty simple. Also I can freeze the coffee for iced coffee whenever I want to.
Really great product for coffee lovers. Though small, it does its job well. So easy to use and easy to clean. Coffee tastes so good.
Perfect size for when I’m just wanting a single cup vs a whole pot
Worked great , for single cup use , easy to clean just not sure about how long it will last but it seems to work better then an older unit I have
Perfect size. Our friends prefer the drip pot style so we bought this to leave at their house! Perfect.
This was a gift to my wife however I use it doing the first initial set up and it work very good.

review name: Coffee maker works well but frother just stopped working!
review text: I loved it until the frother just stopped working all of a sudden. Nothing happened to it, no fall or anything, just stopped which sucks because it made really good thick froth:(
Makes a piping hot cup of coffee in about 5 mins. Great for if you need to make some coffee on the go.

review name: This is really really red... the best red ever!!!! 🙂🙂🙂
review text: I loved its blending power, flavor and easy to clean features. The best flavor of blending power I've ever owned and so damn easy to clean. 😇
works like it should use it every day
I love the color.
Keurig break very easily this is easy to clean and it's perfect
Ground or k-cup this is great for just one cup. It's fast and hot and the red matches my kitchen. I would recommend this.

I use pot coffee daily but enjoy a cup
of decaf in the afternoon. i didn't want a full size machine in my small kitchen, fabulous practical "fit" perfectly, love the product and quality. I use pot coffee daily but enjoy a cup
of decaf in the afternoon.
This makes a great cup of coffee, it just takes a long time for it to brew.

My husband waste coffee but my drinks are really nice I didn't know how nice it was to have an easy way to make drinks
The coffee maker is as pictured, and works as promised. Fits nicely on my limited counter space. So far so good.

I bought the one with milk frother and it’s working great! This coffee machine came with canisters for both k cups and coffee ground. So it’s a 2-in-1. The milk frother makes really nice hot foamy milk very quick and easy. All you have to do is pour in the milk and press the button(either cold or hot) and it will do the work quickly.

I drink a cup of coffee every morning but I don’t need big size of coffee machine. As you can see the picture I attached, compare with paper tower and coffee machine, it takes up very little space on the counter. It also easy to use, It could brew coffee with k-cup or coffee ground and it comes with mug too. Be aware that the color you receive will be a little different, it’s darker than the picture shows on their website. But it’s ok for me. I am so pleased with this purchase.
Affordable. Simple to use. Easy to fill resevioir in the back. Coffee comes out good and hot, and full of flavor.
me gusto

I like this coffee maker color. Nice color ,feel
Comfortable
Easy to use, put water in hub and gound coffee put inside then coffee will made it
The to go cup is great can keep warm and cold
GREAT COFFEE MAKER...QUICK & EFFICIENT
I love the matching cup for just a few dollars more. This is a great coffee maker for a single household! Small and compact and matches my kitchen well! Very happy I bought this
I owned Keurig prior b4 it broke & coffee always taste water dw. This machine is small, one cup & brews slow. Once coffee is brewed using K-cup, worth every drop.
Great product. Super easy to use. Replaced my daily Starbucks run

review name: can make a single serving coffee. Takes only 1 minute to make the coffee
review text:
I have a k-cup coffee machine and I was in need of a regular coffee maker that could take ground beans. My k-cup coffee machine was the best seller of Amazon at the time and it took very long time to make the coffee. However, this coffee maker comes out much faster. It only took about 1 minute so it is very short.

The regular coffee machines cannot make a single serving coffee. Instead, it makes a big pot of coffee. Since this coffee machine could make coffee between 6 oz and 14 oz once, I could make one cup for myself or two for my wife as well. Because we do not drink more than that per day, we do not need to worry about wasting our coffee.

Even though it is versatile (can make k-cup and ground coffee), the coffee machine itself has a small size; thus, it could fit on my crowded counter top easily. Also I chose the black color and it matches with my stainless steel kitchen appliances well.

I also used the milk frother occasionally to make a latte. It can make foam very well and I could put it on the top of my coffee like regular coffee baristas do. That makes the coffee creamer.

I love how this has the option to put your own coffee in or use a K-Cup. I purchased this for my Airbnb studio where I had instant coffee but this is so much better. It works great and the color is perfect! :)
Love it!

review name: Tiny but strong and good looking.
review text:
It’s a nice coffee machine with a perfect size. I have a small kitchen and my kitchen platform is so small that I can not keep much stuff on it. So I like to buy things which are tiny good looking once, but they also should do a good job. I was look for a tiny coffee machine and I think i found one. It’s height is so perfect that it fit perfect in my tiny kitchen. This machine is so tiny but it can beat the any other similar machines in the market. You can either put the single Serb K- cups or a coffee packs in to the machine. In each serving we can fill 8.0z of coffee (either in a coffee mug or a travel mug) they both fit perfect to fill with the machine.

The body and the style makes the machine more good looking and strong. The travel cup that comes with this machine is so good and fits perfect in any car holder. Easy to carry and easy to clean.
